description.en: A young man traveling the world in search of a legendary treasure. Gripped with regret for failing to protect his beloved from the empire、 he joins the rebel group the Returners. Rescuing Terra proves the impetus for Locke to throw himself into defeating both the empire and Kefka.
description.jp:
古代の秘宝を求めて世界中を駆け巡る
トレジャーハンターの青年。帝国から
恋人を守れなかったことを後悔しており
反帝国組織リターナーにも所属している。
ティナを助けたことをきっかけに
打倒帝国 そして打倒ケフカのための
戦いへと 本格的に身を投じていった。

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
Melee BRV attack
Greatly increases BRV damage dealt when attacking enemies not targeting self
Grants [Thief's Gloves] for 3 turns

While [Thief's Gloves] is active:
• [BRV Attack] becomes [Mug]
　∟ Melee BRV attack
　∟ Low Action Delay
　∟ Dispels previously granted [Genji Gloves], [Miracle Shoes]
　∟ Randomly grants either [Genji Gloves] or [Miracle Shoes] for 5 turns

[Thief’s Gloves] raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed

[Genji Gloves] raises Attack

[Miracle Shoes] has the following effects:
• Raises Speed
• Lowers BRV damage taken
• Grants BRV regen
desc.gl:
Melee BRV attack
Deals extra BRV damage when attacking enemy not targeting self
Self: 3 turns Brigand's Glove
BRV Attack becomes Mug while Brigand's Glove active
desc.jp:
近距離物理BRV攻撃
自身を狙っていないターゲット攻撃時 より大きなBRVダメージ
自身に3ACTION「盗賊の小手」付与
「盗賊の小手」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「ぶんどる」に変化

desc.en: AoE ranged BRV+HP attack\nHP Damage is split equally amongst all enemies
desc.gl: Group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack\nDeals proportionate HP damage to each target
desc.jp: 全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃\n与えるHPダメージは分配

desc.gl: Phoenix Ray+
desc.jp: フェニックスレイ＋

desc.gl:
Grants party BRV based on own ATK
Group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of individual MAX HP
desc.jp:
味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算し
全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配
与えたHPダメージに応じて味方全員のHP中回復
回復量の上限は それぞれの最大HPの20％分

desc.gl: Phoenix Ray+
desc.jp: フェニックスレイ＋

desc.gl:
3-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target

攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
与えるHPダメージは分配

name.jp: スニークスラッシュエクステンド

desc.en:
「Sneak Slash」 use +2

When using 「Sneak Slash」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 3
- Tremendously raises its total potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Extends the duration of 「Thief's Gloves」 by 1 turn
- Triggers an HP attack after use

After use, 「Sneak Slash」 turns into 「Sneak Slash+」 with the following effects:
- If the target is hit, moves the user's next turn right before the target's turn (except during Summon)
- Cancels existing 「Genji's Gloves」 and 「Miracle Shoes」
- Randomly grants 「Genji's Gloves」 or 「Miracle Shoes」 for 6 turns
- Reverts back to 「Sneak Slash」 after use

When using 「Mug」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2.
- Moderately raises its total potency
- Extends of duration of 「Genji's Gloves」 or 「Miracle Shoes」 by 1 turn

When using 「HP Attack+ (Genji Gloves)」:
- Greatly raises its potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When using 「HP Attack+ (Miracle Shoes)」:
- Greatly raises its potency
- Doesn't increase turn count
- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
desc.gl:
Sneak Slash use +2

When using Sneak Slash:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Brigand's Glove duration +1
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Sneak Slash:
 • Sneak Slash becomes Sneak Slash+ (moves own next turn to just before target's next turn on hit [except during summoning]; cancels previously granted Genji Glove, Miracle Shoes; self: 6 turns Genji Glove or Miracle Shoes; returns to Sneak Slash after use)

When using Mug:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Genji Glove, Miracle Shoes duration +1

When using HP Attack+ (Genji Glove):
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using HP Attack+ (Miracle Shoes):
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
desc.jp:
「スニークスラッシュ」使用回数＋2

「スニークスラッシュ」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ

　ターゲットの直前に移動（召喚中は除く）
・使用前に付与されている
　「源氏の小手」「ミラクルシューズ」解除し
　自身に6ACTION「源氏の小手」「ミラクルシューズ」
　のいずれか1個付与
・使用後「スニークスラッシュ」に戻る

「ぶんどる」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・「源氏の小手」「ミラクルシューズ」の1ACTION期間延長

・BRV威力大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

「HP攻撃＋（ミラクルシューズ）」使用時
・BRV威力大アップ
・総ACTION数に加算されない
　召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される
